column4: hey, anyone had problems with instability with a kernel? Whenever I have my stable overclocks on (4.2 ghz on a core i7) my computer crashes despite windows working just fine with hours of prime95...
2.6.32-28 was the only truly stable kernel, any of the new ones crash
which log should I look under for that?
I'm running 2.6.32-31 on two machines & they're both very stable
